.pro files

gmos_maps_fiber.pro

Plot color-coded maps of a quantity across the GMOS FOV in the native GMOS spaxel space (i.e., a grid of hexagons).

gmos_sky.pro

Apply wavelength shift to individual spaxels as determined from a sky line.
